channel.title: [PI] How to Add System Update?
channel.description:
Hey!
I have a PI Server and I wan't to add the System Update D:
How can I add the Code?
Thanks!

item.title: [PI] How to Add System Update?
item.dc:creator: @k1ng0frs k1ng0frs
item.description:
@k1ng0frs wrote:

oh dang feel Dumb

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] How to Add System Update?
item.dc:creator: @nL1 nL
item.description:
@nL1 wrote:

[quote=“k1ng0frs, post:2, topic:405328”]if (playerCommand.startsWith("update") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("PUTYOURNAMEHERE")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a; PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }[/quote]

you didnt close off your 'c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“namehere”)) < you have two parenthesis, so you need one infront of c.

(c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“namehere”))

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] How to Add System Update?
item.dc:creator: @k1ng0frs k1ng0frs
item.description:
@k1ng0frs wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("update") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("PUTYOURNAMEHERE")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a; PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

Read full topic
